duties_responsibilities.duty: Work closely with the Customer Service / Field Service Organization to develop and deploy new SFDC based solutions.
Implement new and enhance existing functionality on Salesforce.com and related applications.
Articulate requirements and translate them to effective solutions for Field Service, Service Contracts, Technical Support, and Customer Support stakeholders.
Engage with the existing SFDC Center of Excellence to represent projects and enhancements that affect the Service Organization.
Perform configuration/system changes to meet business requirements as needed and ensure proper level of testing and documentation is completed for all work.
Lead cross-functional meetings as part of requirements gathering, driving projects, or providing status updates on various projects.
Interface with other analysts, business users, super users, and IT team members to support business operations and drive change management.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's or undergraduate degree in Computer Science, Information Systems, or equivalent experience (Master's preferred)
